name: S.N.S.
description:
A game about the role of censorship, which acts as a noise in the transmission of information between society and governments. #ggjdare Social Impact (PT-BR Only)

Download the executable for better graphics.

Made with Unity

Global Game Jam 2018 - Virgo Studio 

SNS TEAM:

Altivo Ovando Neto - Programming and Game Design

Caio Tessarolo Uliana - Story, Narrative, Producer and Game Design

Rodrigo Dorta Marques - 3D Art and Texturing

Nicolas Dutra Rocha - 2D Art, Audio Design and Game Design

Victor Barbosa de Moura Ferreira - 3D Art, Texturing and Game Design

Felipe - Programming

São Paulo - Brasil.
